languages.text: Вы оказались бастардом — незаконорожденным членом семьи, которая немедленно отвернулась от вас.
You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.
languages.original_text: Вы оказались бастардом — незаконорожденным членом семьи, которая немедленно отвернулась от вас.

traits.locale_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.
You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.
You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.
You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

languages.text: Vous êtes {mf|un bâtard|une bâtarde}, l'enfant illégitime d'une famille qui vous a immédiatement tourné le dos.
languages.original_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

traits.locale_text: Vous êtes {mf|un bâtard|une bâtarde}, l'enfant illégitime d'une famille qui vous a immédiatement tourné le dos.

languages.text: La ilegitimidad de tu nacimiento hizo que toda tu familia te diera la espalda.
languages.original_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

traits.locale_text: La ilegitimidad de tu nacimiento hizo que toda tu familia te diera la espalda.

languages.text: あなたは私生児であり、あなたの家族は、すぐさまあなたを見捨てた。
languages.original_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

traits.locale_text: あなたは私生児であり、あなたの家族は、すぐさまあなたを見捨てた。

languages.text: 你是某个家族的私生子。你的家族发现了这件事情之后，立刻与你切断了一切联系。
languages.original_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

traits.locale_text: 你是某个家族的私生子。你的家族发现了这件事情之后，立刻与你切断了一切联系。

languages.text: Du bist ein uneheliches, illegitimes Mitglied einer Familie, die dir sofort den Rücken gekehrt hat.
languages.original_text: You are a bastard, an illegitimate member of a family that immediately turned its back on you.

traits.locale_text: Du bist ein uneheliches, illegitimes Mitglied einer Familie, die dir sofort den Rücken gekehrt hat.
